'''Oculus Resonance Stones''' are [[Gadgets]] which can be used to locate [[Oculi]] in their respective [[Teyvat|regions]].

==Types==
{{Items by Category List|Oculus Resonance Stones}}

==Notes==
* Resonance Stones currently cannot locate any Oculi in another player's world.
